mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORKER ( ADMIN_ID,WORKER_SEQ, WORKER_NAME, WORKER_BIRTH, WORKER_GRADE, PAY ) VALUES( #{adminId}, (select nvl(max(worker_seq),0)+1 from worker), #{workerName}, #{workerBirth}, #{workerGrade}, #{pay} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WORKER WHERE admin_id = #{adminId} ORDER BY worker_seq
SELECT WORKER_SEQ, WORKER_NAME, WORKER_BIRTH, WORKER_GRADE, PAY FROM WORKER WHERE WORKER_SEQ=#{workerSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE WORKER SET WORKER_NAME = #{workerName}, WORKER_BIRTH = #{workerBirth}, PAY = #{pay}, WORKER_GRADE = #{workerGrade} WHERE WORKER_SEQ = #{workerSeq}
